languages.text: Спустя пять лет после похода на Эпитафию Веабос-6 вымер в результате неизвестной напасти, пришедшей из-под земли. Каторжане и надсмотрщики были отравлены, растерзаны либо просто исчезли. Но вскоре невольничьи бараки были населены вновь, ведь в Просторе никогда не заканчивались преступники и изгои.

Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Спустя пять лет после похода на Эпитафию Веабос-6 вымер в результате неизвестной напасти, пришедшей из-под земли. Каторжане и надсмотрщики были отравлены, растерзаны либо просто исчезли. Но вскоре невольничьи бараки были населены вновь, ведь в Просторе никогда не заканчивались преступники и изгои.

traits.locale_text: Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

languages.text: 荒垄碑碣之役五年之后，维博斯六号星地下发生了某种未知的灾难，整颗行星的人都死了。那些犯人与守卫要么被毒死，要么遭到肢解，要么凭空消失。不过，事故发生之后没过多久，犯人营房就再次被重新填满，因为科罗努斯扩区从来不缺罪犯和遭到放逐的人。
languages.original_text: Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 荒垄碑碣之役五年之后，维博斯六号星地下发生了某种未知的灾难，整颗行星的人都死了。那些犯人与守卫要么被毒死，要么遭到肢解，要么凭空消失。不过，事故发生之后没过多久，犯人营房就再次被重新填满，因为科罗努斯扩区从来不缺罪犯和遭到放逐的人。

languages.text: エピタフの作戦から5年後、ヴィアボス・VIは地下からの未知の災難の末によって死滅した。受刑者と監督者は毒を盛られ、ずたずたに切られ、あるいは単純に姿を消した。しかし奴隷の仮宿舎は、すぐに再び補充された。エクスパンスにおいて、追放者と犯罪人は尽きることがなかったからだ。
languages.original_text: Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: エピタフの作戦から5年後、ヴィアボス・VIは地下からの未知の災難の末によって死滅した。受刑者と監督者は毒を盛られ、ずたずたに切られ、あるいは単純に姿を消した。しかし奴隷の仮宿舎は、すぐに再び補充された。エクスパンスにおいて、追放者と犯罪人は尽きることがなかったからだ。

languages.text: Cinq ans après la campagne d'Épitaphe, Vhéabos-VI dépérit en raison d'un fléau inconnu surgi des profondeurs de la terre. Condamnés et superviseurs étaient empoisonnés, mutilés ou disparaissaient tout simplement. Toutefois, les casernes d'esclaves furent rapidement repeuplées, car les parias et les criminels ne manquaient pas dans les Étendues.
languages.original_text: Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Cinq ans après la campagne d'Épitaphe, Vhéabos-VI dépérit en raison d'un fléau inconnu surgi des profondeurs de la terre. Condamnés et superviseurs étaient empoisonnés, mutilés ou disparaissaient tout simplement. Toutefois, les casernes d'esclaves furent rapidement repeuplées, car les parias et les criminels ne manquaient pas dans les Étendues.

languages.text: Cinco años después de la campaña de Epitafio, Vheabos VI quedó abandonado como resultado de un asalto desconocido que provenía del subsuelo. Tanto prisioneros como supervisores quedaron envenenados, despedazados o desaparecieron sin dejar rastro. Aun así, los barracones de los esclavos reponían sus filas casi al momento, pues no había falta de proscritos ni delincuentes en la Extensión.
languages.original_text: Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Cinco años después de la campaña de Epitafio, Vheabos VI quedó abandonado como resultado de un asalto desconocido que provenía del subsuelo. Tanto prisioneros como supervisores quedaron envenenados, despedazados o desaparecieron sin dejar rastro. Aun así, los barracones de los esclavos reponían sus filas casi al momento, pues no había falta de proscritos ni delincuentes en la Extensión.

languages.text: Fünf Jahre nach dem Epitaph-Feldzug starb Vheabos VI in Folge einer unbekannten Seuche unterirdischen Ursprungs aus. Häftlinge und Aufsehern wurden vergiftet, verstümmelt oder verschwanden einfach. Doch die Sklavenunterkünfte waren rasch wieder gefüllt, denn Ausgestoßene und Kriminelle gab es in der Ausdehnung zuhauf.
languages.original_text: Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Fünf Jahre nach dem Epitaph-Feldzug starb Vheabos VI in Folge einer unbekannten Seuche unterirdischen Ursprungs aus. Häftlinge und Aufsehern wurden vergiftet, verstümmelt oder verschwanden einfach. Doch die Sklavenunterkünfte waren rasch wieder gefüllt, denn Ausgestoßene und Kriminelle gab es in der Ausdehnung zuhauf.

languages.text: Sinyazıt seferinden beş yıl sonra Vheabos VI sakinleri; yerin altından gelen, bilinmeyen bir musibetin elinde can verdi. Suçlular ve gözetmenleri zehirlendi, biçimsizleşti veya durduk yere ortadan kayboldu. Buna rağmen köle kışlaları hızla yeniden doldu. Sonuçta Enginlik, yurtsuz ve suçlu eksikliği çekilen bir yer değildi.
languages.original_text: Five years after the Epitaph campaign, Vheabos VI died out as a result of an unknown scourge that came from beneath the ground. Convicts and overseers were poisoned, mangled, or just disappeared. However, the slave barracks were quickly repopulated, for there was no shortage of outcasts and criminals in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Kitabe seferinden beş yıl sonra Vheabos VI, yerin altından gelen bilinmeyen bir musibet sonucunda yok oldu. Suçlular ve gözetmenleri zehirlendi, biçimsizleşti veya durduk yere ortadan kayboldu. Ancak köle kışlaları hızlı bir şekilde yeniden doldu. Sonuçta Enginlik, yurtsuz ve suçlu eksikliği çekilen bir yer değildi.
